original_title: ASPI crosses 22,000 for the first time
original_body_lines: The All Share Price Index (ASPI) of the Colombo Stock Exchange (CSE) surpassed the 22,000-point mark for the first time in history, during this morning’s (03) trading session.
At around 09.35 a.m. this morning (03), the index stood at 22,017.56 points.
